chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: input -> option nat
prec: input -> bool
prec_valid: forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v
cls: seq nid
cs: seq nid
Huniq: is_true (uniq nodes)
d: dstatelet

Goal:
calcoh d -> valid (dsoup d)

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
valid : ?cT -> bool where ?cT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- pcm]
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
input = seq nat : Set
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- Type]
Notation nodes := (cs ++ cls)
uniq : seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- eqType]
Notation seq := list
calcoh = fun d : dstatelet => [/\ soupCoh (dsoup d), dom (dstate d) =i nodes, valid (dstate d) & forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes -> localCoh n (getLocal n d)] : dstatelet -> Prop
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
find_some : find ?k ?f = Some ?v -> ?k \in dom ?f where ?K : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- ordType] ?V : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- Type] ?U : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- UMC.sort ?U]
find_none : find ?k ?f = None -> ?k \notin dom ?f where ?K : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- ordType] ?V : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- Type] ?U : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- UMC.sort ?U]
path_sorted : path ?leT ?x ?s -> sorted ?leT ?s where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- Type] ?leT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- rel ?T] ?x : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- seq ?T]
order_path_min : transitive ?leT -> path ?leT ?x ?s -> all (?leT ?x) ?s where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- Type] ?leT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- rel ?T] ?x : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i ->...-> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- seq ?T]
comp : (?B -> ?A) -> (?C -> ?B) -> ?C -> ?A where ?A : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- Type] ?B : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- Type] ?C : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- Type]
pts : ?K -> ?V -> ?cT where ?K : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- ordType] ?V : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- Type] ?cT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- union_map_class ?K ?V]
eqP : reflect (?x = ?y) (?x == ?y) where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- eqType] ?x : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- Equality.sort ?T] ?y : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- Equality.sort ?T]
and3P : reflect [/\ ?b1, ?b2 & ?b3] [&& ?b1, ?b2 & ?b3] where ?b1 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- bool] ?b2 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- bool] ?b3 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- bool]
or3P : reflect [\/ ?b1, ?b2 | ?b3] [|| ?b1, ?b2 | ?b3] where ?b1 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- bool] ?b2 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- bool] ?b3 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- bool]
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- Type] ?B : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes d : dstatelet |- Type]

```coq
intros.

original: intros. destruct calcoh as [HsoupCoh [HdomEq Hvalid]]. apply Hvalid.
